nodes.text: The Okeefe family, or House Okeefe, was a noble and prominent Brentaalan merchant house with a roomily residence on Brentaal IV in the Core Worlds. Members of this family include the infamous Platt Okeefe, her aunt Sirona Okeefe, both smugglers, as well as Barthos Okeefe who worked as a director at he HoloNet relay station above their homeworld until the age of sixty. At some point during the Galactic Civil War a criminal organization named Sun Storm tried to take over the merchant house.
